title: Occamy System Schema
description: Description for a very simple single-cluster testbench. That is the most minimal system available. Most of the hardware is emulated by the testbench.

nr_clusters.description: Number of clusters in an S1 quadrant.

count.description: The number of cache lines per set. Power of two; >= 2.

sets.description: The set associativity of the cache. Power of two; >= 1.
